title: 'Comfortable and sturdy'
body: I have had sandals and shoes from Sparx before and this time I tried the slippers which are very comfortable, good quality, soft sole and very light. Sparx products are long lasting and I hope the same from the slippers. I'm happy with my purchase.

title: 'Good design Bad quality sole.'
body: 'Comes with low quality plastic sole it is slippery. Not suitable for home or tiles. Size is not standard. Mine is 10 but this appears little small. I guess it wont be durable as said in previous review. Just design is good. Rest is average.'
